name: Gloamwing
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.Death Link: If its specter rider is reduced to 0 hit points, the gloamwing is destroyed.
traits.Flyby: The gloamwing doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
traits.Sunlight Sensitivity: While in sunlight, the gloamwing has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
